name: OilSpill
description:
Investors are paying you to reach out for new crude oil fields. Pick up a car and take the route to reach the highly coveted black gold. The more fuel you waste, the happier your investors and supporters will be. Just leave enough propellant left in your tank in order to keep driving.

The prototype OilSpill is a student project for the "Retromorphosis" course of the University of the Arts (Zurich) - GameDesign.
Created by: Julian Schönbächler
Lecturers: Max Moswitzer, Livio Lunin

Features
  • Three different levels with slightly different mechanics
  • Three different car types
  • Fast arcade racing
  • Explosions
  • Even more explosions
